'''Roll-Roofed Fruit and Vegetable Cart''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Roll-Roofed Fruit and Vegetable Cart is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Birch Wood = 12
|sort = Birch Wood
}}
